trans-unit.source: Manages the user interface (UI) for a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Administra la interfaz de usuario para un panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: You can control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar la visualización de su diseñador <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> clase.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> provides a straightforward interface for displaying the items for each component, including the following methods and events:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> Proporciona una interfaz sencilla para mostrar los elementos de cada componente, incluidos los siguientes métodos y eventos:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods display and hide the items for a component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> métodos mostrar y ocultar los elementos de un componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event indicates when the UI changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> evento indica cuándo cambia la interfaz de usuario para un componente.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> collections associated with your component.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> para administrar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> colecciones asociadas a su componente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method to update a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> método para actualizar un panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso disponible en la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> general sobre la clase.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a request is made to show or hide a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se realiza una solicitud para mostrar u ocultar un panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the set of specialized classes associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente enumera el conjunto de clases especializadas asociadas con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Specialized type
trans-unit.target: Tipo especializado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: Adds information specific to smart tag panel management.
trans-unit.target: Agrega información específica para la administración de panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase está especializada de <xref:System.EventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Se conecta el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> con su controlador.

trans-unit.source: Denotes whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Indica si el panel de etiquetas inteligentes se va a mostrar u ocultar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el control de eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que utiliza la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Componente cuyo panel de etiquetas inteligentes debe ocultarse.

trans-unit.source: Hides the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Oculta el panel de etiquetas inteligentes para un componente.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently being displayed, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method will hide it.
trans-unit.target: Si actualmente se muestra el panel de etiquetas inteligentes, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> método lo ocultará.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Este método provoca el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> eventos, estipular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide> como el tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> se implementan métodos solo para provocar los eventos correspondientes.

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: La funcionalidad real se encuentra en los controladores para estos eventos, que forman parte del entorno de tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to refresh.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a actualizar.

trans-unit.source: Updates the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Actualiza el panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method updates the internal `DesignerAction`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, as well as the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> método actualiza interno `DesignerAction` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, así como el panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method to update a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> método para actualizar un panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso disponible en la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> general sobre la clase.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to automatically show.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a mostrar automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to automatically show the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Indica si se muestra automáticamente el panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically show the smart tag panel; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para que se muestre automáticamente el panel de etiquetas inteligentes; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Componente cuyo panel de etiquetas inteligentes debe mostrarse.

trans-unit.source: Displays the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Muestra el panel de etiquetas inteligentes para un componente.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently hidden, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> method will display the panel.
trans-unit.target: Si el panel de etiquetas inteligentes está oculto actualmente, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> método mostrará el panel.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Este método provoca el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> eventos, estipular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show> como el tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> se implementan métodos solo para provocar los eventos correspondientes.

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: La funcionalidad real se encuentra en los controladores para estos eventos, que forman parte del entorno de tiempo de diseño.
